metadata.feature_description: Manages file metadata including title, description, tags, and system attributes like archive, hidden, read-only

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel and select batch_image_2.png file
steps.expected: File details panel opens with editable fields
steps.actual: File details panel opened showing file properties

steps.action: Edit title field to 'Batch Image Test Title' and click Save
steps.expected: Title is saved successfully
steps.actual: Title was saved without errors

steps.action: Re-open file details to verify title persisted
steps.expected: Title shows 'Batch Image Test Title'
steps.actual: Title correctly shows 'Batch Image Test Title' after reopening

steps.action: Enter description text in Description field
steps.expected: Description text is accepted
steps.actual: Description 'This is a test description for the batch image file used for metadata testing.' was entered

steps.action: Save and verify description persists
steps.expected: Description is saved and shows on reopening
steps.actual: Description was saved successfully and verified on reopen

steps.action: Add tag 'test-tag' to the Tags field
steps.expected: Tag is added and displayed
steps.actual: Tag 'test-tag' was added successfully and displayed with remove button

steps.action: Save and verify tag persists
steps.expected: Tag is saved and shows on reopening
steps.actual: Tag was saved successfully and verified on reopen

steps.action: Click remove button on 'test-tag'
steps.expected: Tag is removed from the file
steps.actual: Tag was removed successfully, Tags field now empty

steps.action: Toggle Archive attribute to On
steps.expected: Archive attribute is set to On
steps.actual: Archive toggle switched to On successfully

steps.action: Save and verify Archive attribute persists
steps.expected: Archive attribute remains On after save
steps.actual: Archive attribute verified as On after save and reopen

steps.action: Toggle Hidden attribute to On
steps.expected: Hidden attribute is set to On
steps.actual: Hidden toggle switched to On successfully

steps.action: Save and verify Hidden attribute persists
steps.expected: Hidden attribute remains On after save
steps.actual: Hidden attribute verified as On after save and reopen

steps.action: Toggle Read-Only attribute to On
steps.expected: Read-Only attribute is set to On
steps.actual: Read-Only toggle switched to On successfully

steps.action: Save and verify Read-Only attribute persists
steps.expected: Read-Only attribute remains On after save
steps.actual: Read-Only attribute verified as On after save and reopen

steps.action: Toggle System attribute to On
steps.expected: System attribute is set to On
steps.actual: System toggle switched to On successfully

steps.action: Save and verify System attribute persists
steps.expected: System attribute remains On after save
steps.actual: System attribute verified as On after save

steps.action: Toggle Publish Period to On
steps.expected: Publish Period is enabled and date fields appear
steps.actual: Publish Period toggled On, Start Date and End Date fields appeared with Start Date defaulting to file creation date (12/28/2025)

steps.action: Save and verify Publish Period persists
steps.expected: Publish Period setting is saved
steps.actual: Publish Period saved successfully and verified as On

steps.action: Clear the required Name field (marked with *)
steps.expected: Name field becomes empty
steps.actual: Name field cleared successfully

steps.action: Click Save with empty Name field
steps.expected: Validation error appears preventing save
steps.actual: Validation error 'Text is required' appeared below the Name field, save was prevented

steps.action: Set multiple metadata fields (Title, Description, Tags, all attributes)
steps.expected: All fields accept input
steps.actual: All metadata fields accepted input successfully

steps.action: Click Save to persist all changes
steps.expected: Save completes without error
steps.actual: Save completed successfully, panel closed

steps.action: Re-open file details to verify all metadata persisted
steps.expected: All metadata fields show saved values
steps.actual: All metadata fields (Title, Description, Tags, Archive, Hidden, Read-Only, System, Publish Period) verified as saved

observations: End Date field in Publish Period is read-only and requires a date picker to be clicked - direct text input is not supported
When saving file details for cavalier-logo.png initially, received 'File doesn't exist' error - switched to batch_image_2.png which worked correctly
Code confirms FileDetails DTO supports: FileId, FileName, Title, Description, Tags, EnablePublishPeriod, StartDate, EndDate, Archive, Hidden, ReadOnly, System attributes
